description: Focused internship working on Ethereum infrastructure for Alpen Labs, specifically contributing to core serialization protocols and performance optimizations.
responsibilities: Converted Python-based SSZ serialization logic to Rust
Improved performance and memory safety of Ethereum infrastructure
Collaborated with international team on protocol specifications
Contributed to testing and documentation of core libraries
achievements: Successfully migrated critical serialization components to Rust
Demonstrated ability to work with complex protocol specifications
